results.title: Mountain lands in jeopardy
results.brief_description: The soil erosion caused by introduced animals in the mountains of New Zealand. The vegetation in the alpine country around the head-waters of the Waitake River has been destoryed by deer, hare and thar. Burning off the natural tussock to create sheep pasture has added to the problem. Erosion and flooding of valley farms has resulted.

results.title: Mount Isa copper
results.creator_credit: Antonio Colacino, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Tells the story of the copper industry based at Mt Isa in Queensland. Introduces typical workers and a housewife living in the town of 14,000 people. Shows completion of refining at Stuart near Townsville of pure copper suited to electrical use. Commentary by Shan Benson.

results.title: Mount Buffalo National Park
results.brief_description: A summer-time study of one of Victoria’s most popular holiday resorts. Mount Buffalo provides facilities for snow sports in winter, and is ideal for hiking, fishing, climbing and cross-country walking in summer. Commentary by Terry Dear, photography by Roy Driver.

results.title: Motown 25: Yesterday, Today, Forever
results.brief_description: Hosted by Richard Pryor, this is a fast paced, all star reunion that spotlights performances by the biggest acts ever to come out of Detroit including vintage footage of the groups from the sixties and seventies. It looks behind the scenes into what made Motown tick, the songwriters who helped bring the Motown sound to fame and the man who started it all, the legendary Berry Gordy. Rated: G

results.title: Motor mania (K)
results.creator_credit: Jack Kinney and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: A Disney animated film about road safety and the change that takes place in an average individual when they sit behind the wheel of a car. The pleasant, courteous Mr Walker becomes the fiendish Mr Wheeler, forgetting how it feels to be a pedestrian and stubbornly blind to his failings as a driver.
results.description: A Disney animated film about road safety and the change that takes place in an average individual when they sit behind the wheel of a car.
